summary: ‘Wow-‘ Kirishima sighed looking at the fireworks. Warm oceanic wind was moving his wet hair gently and his big red eyes was...
body:
‘Wow-‘ Kirishima sighed looking at the fireworks. Warm oceanic wind was moving his wet hair gently and his big red eyes was sparkling in excitement. ‘Have you even seen anything more beautiful?’ he asked Bakugou.

‘I might… Have something in mind.’

blog.name: quirky-hero-imagines
blog.title: BNHA Imagines
blog.description:
Heyo! Another imagines and writing BNHA blog because there can never be enough💕 INBOX IS CLOSED [33]

Masterlist

FAQ Rules

summary: Hi! I absolutely love your blog! If it’s not too much to ask, and if you’re still doing it, would you be willing to write an a-z...
question: Hi! I absolutely love your blog! If it’s not too much to ask, and if you’re still doing it, would you be willing to write an a-z for midoriya for the nsfw alphabet thing, like you did with mirio?
answer:
Thank you for sending a request ❤️

I’m so happy to hear that you enjoy my blog!

Be warned ‼️ Smut/Lemon ‼️


A= Aftercare (What they’re like after sex) Midoriya would be so sweet and flustered, just holding you close in silence and enjoying the feeling of you.

B= Body part (favorite body part of theirs and their partner’s) His favorite body part of his are his hands, having first used his new quirk with them. His favorite body part of yours is your mouth, he finds your lips so soft.

C= Cum Midoriya likes to make as little of a mess as possible so it’s hard for him to decide where to cum, whatever you decide he’ll go with.

D= Dirty secret Even though Midoriya gets flustered quite easily he actually really enjoys it when you talk dirty to him.

E= Experience (how experienced are they? Do they know what they’re doing?) He doesn’t have any experience, being quite shy around girls. He would try his very best, so that would make up for the lack of experience a little.

F= Favorite Position It might sound bland but missionary. He likes to see your face during it the whole time.

G= Goofy (are they more serious in the moment or humorous?) He’s definitely more serious, a little awkward but not humorous.

H= Hair (how well-groomed are they? Does the carpet match the drapes?) Midoriya takes good care of himself and it keeps it completely shaven.

I= Intimacy (how are they during the moment?) Like I said he’s a little awkward but also very sweet to you.

J= Jack off When he isn’t in a relationship, he jerks off about once a week.

K= Kink I can’t think of any kinks for him!

L= Location (favorite places to do it) The bed because he’s the most comfortable there.

M= Motivation (What turns them on?) It really turns him on when you tell him you want him because it gives him assurance.

N= No (something they wouldn’t do) He wouldn’t do BDSM, having no interest in it at all.

O = Oral (do they prefer giving or receiving + skill) He prefers giving because it gets him less embarrassed than watching you do it.

P= Pace (are they fast and rough or slow and sensual) Definitely a more slow and sensual type of guy. He makes love instead of fucking, so to say.

Q= Quickie (their opinions on quickies and how often) He likes it now and then when you are feeling needy, but it doesn’t happen often.

R= Risk (are they okay with experimenting? Do they take risks?) Nope nope no risks thank you.

S= Stamina (how many rounds can they go? How long do they last?) Midoriya cums pretty fast because he gets very excited, but he can a second round if you want.

T= Toy (do they own toys? Do they use them?) Nope none.

U= Unfair (how much they like to tease) He isn’t a tease, but he does enjoy it when you tease him a little with dirty talk.

V= Volume (how loud they are) His volume is low in general but when he cums he grunts pretty loudly.

W= Wild card (random headcanon) Even though he prefers giving he does enjoy it when you give him a blowjob. At first he’s a bit tense but after getting into it he actually really enjoys it.

X= X-ray (what’s going on in those pants) Midoriya is average in length but has a bit more of thickness.

Y= Yearning (how high is their sex drive?) His sex drive is kind of low, having sex with you about once a week.

Z= Zzz (how quickly they fall asleep afterwards) Midoriya doesn’t fall asleep till you do because he wants to make sure you are alright.

summary: I’ll still never forgive Bones for leaving out this scene. Unless they somehow slide it into season 4, which I doubt. It might...
caption: I’ll still never forgive Bones for leaving out this scene. Unless they somehow slide it into season 4, which I doubt. It might be small… but it’s the retirement of the Symbol of Peace, the number one hero! THAT’S… FAIRLY IMPORTANT TO SHOW??
